questions.question: When viewing the list of changes, which of the following methods won't let you check the change's component type (transformer, feature type, etc.)?
options: Look at the icon, which will match the component icon in Workbench
Click the "Group cards by category" button and change the group mode from "Change Type" to "Component Type."
Right-click the change and select "View Change Location."
Use the "Filter by component type" button in the toolbar.

questions.question: How many feature types were added in the modified (v2) workspace?
When selecting changes to merge, you can click checkboxes to select all the Added, Modified, or Deleted changes at once.
